posts.post_title: SOLD--> N172 OLD JUDGE Fred Pfeffer GAI VG-EX 4
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian H (misunderestimated)
I bought this recently but I have a Mayo card of Pfeffer as well as raw OJ I am getting graded (which I will probably also sell).  Looking it over closely I think the grade is fair -- the centering is terrible,  the corners are rounded but there are no creases and the back is very clean.


BIO : Fred Pfeffer was the 2nd Basemen for the Chicago NL team (N/K/A "the Cubs")for several  years throughout their dominant period in the 1880's.  He was quite a character and he was one of the players Chicago team-owner A.G. Spalding took on his celebrated "World Tour" and his first-hand account in letters provides much of what is known about what it was really like.


XXXXX -- includes insurance/shipping etc.
Paypal accepted -- first to contact me accepting these terms at bhodes@rcn.com has priority.
